---
title: "features.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file defines feature flags and their states for a production environment. It specifies that the features within the "production" namespace are enabled or disabled.

## Code Structure
This file uses a simple YAML structure to define a single namespace "production".  There are no interconnected symbols in this file.

## Symbols
### `namespace: production`
#### Description
This line defines a namespace called "production". Namespaces are used to group feature flags and their configurations. This allows for different environments or groups to have different feature flag settings.

#### Internal Logic
This line declares that the following feature flags and their states belong to the "production" namespace.
